body_html:
A fix for this might need significant changes to C++ part of the runtime.
This is similar to the issue of Dequeue of an empty queue causing an uninterruptible hang.

Python client thread detects ctrl+C, but how to tell underlying C threads to die?
To see an example of complexity, this is the commit that added timeout option to session.run:
fa07bfd

cc: @mrry in case he can see a way for client to interrupt the runtime
